lines.text:
[slowly realizing]
It's all true. I'm a monster... a monster.
She stuck me in the eyes! I can hardly see!
We are going into that living room, and we're gonna find that safe. Now, today ain't gonna be a total loss. We are going in there and LOOK!
No I ain't BLINDED, Randall! What do you think I am that old wino?
He who unleashes the terror, reaps the terror!
I am a human being. A feeling, thinking, human being.

[mocking]
Okay. I am *all* animal. Sure beats the hell outta being an inmate...

[to George]
We're gonna kill you, pop. All of you. You... and the pig. And the human being.
When will we go back to the gods of our childhood?
